p:
At the end of 2018, 6 countries—Botswana, Cambodia, Denmark, eSwatini, Namibia, and the Netherlands—already had reached the 90–90–90 targets and 7 more countries were on track to do so by 2020.
3 But, progress across regions of the globe remains quite variable: Western and Central Europe and North America are approaching global targets; Latin America and Eastern and Southern Africa show high levels of achievement across the targets; but, Eastern Europe and Central Asia, the Middle East and North Africa, and Western and Central Africa clearly are off track.
2
